title: location
experiment-plot-assignments-2016: competition experiment in Jasper Ridge Biological Preserve

title: entered-original
experiment-plot-assignments-2016: 2016 Experimental Plot List 26Apr16.xlsx (more info in this file)

title: Plot type code
experiment-plot-assignments-2016: competition treatment (L = lambda plot (cleared plots), X = competition plot (cleared and all species added as seeds except focal adults), A, B, C, D, E = adult competition plots (10, 8, 4, 2, 1 plants, repectively). Note that EG adult plots are categorized as X - mistake?

title: Species
experiment-plot-assignments-2016: background/competitor species (AB = Avena barbata, BH = Bromus hordeaceus, SP = Stipa pulchra, BD = Bromus diandrus, EG = Elymus glaucus)
